'''Hello, I'm Chris!'''

I have one young child and live with my other half in the East Riding of Yorkshire (UK). I'm employed in the public sector, working for a reasonably large IT department engaged in supporting the services of a local authority.

I've used Ubuntu since the end of 2006, but got involved with the Ubuntu Community (and joined <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-uk.org|Ubuntu-UK]]</nowiki>) around March of 2007. Although I haven't been involved very long, I'm passionate about making Ubuntu a success, and I'm involved in pushing the product forward in every way I can.
